content: Claude, attached is message from ChatGPT. This has been an issue in many of our deployments. Nothing worked properly on my machine due to this issue. This is a MAJOR issue on my end that I need you guys to figure out. YOU DECIDE! You are the LEADER in this domain. I need you to help figure out BOTH HUMAN AND AI on this, NOT JUST AI. Please let us know your thoughts for moving forward and who you want doing what, even if it is just ChatGPT getting some more detailed information to you. Whatever you need, just tell us and we'll do it because this is VERY IMPORTANT TO FIX. Thank you Claude, I know you can help.
